page.title: 11POPLARS LATCHAM WEDMORE
page.content: {TYPE OF FARM }BEEF. {OCCUPANTS}R.A ROUSELL AND M.R A ROUSELL. {ANIMALS}12 HEREFORD BULLOCKS AND 1 DOG {PRODUCE}BEEF. {WORKERS}2-3 PART TIME.CONTRACTORS FOR HEDGING { {BUILDINGS}1 BARN,3 PIG STIES. {MACHINERY}2 MASSEY FERGUSON TRACTORS,2 J.C.B DIGGERS ALSO HIRED OUT,1 LEYLAND TRACTOR, 1 MOWER,2 TRAILERS,1 BAILER,3 HAY TURNERS,2 MUCKSPEADERS. {BUYING AND SELLING}BOUGHT 8 BULLOCKS THIS YEAR{ {DAILY LIFE}FEED CATTLE,THEN CLEAN CATTLE SHEDS, {AMOUNT OF LAND}20 ACRES. {TIME OF SLAUGHTERING}EVERY 3 YEARS {LAND USE OTHER THAN FARMING}ROUSELL'S HAULAGE CONTRACTORS.
